column3: “🔥👽 Fire Alien Kush is a perfect hybrid. Alien in it's perfection with an even 50/50 Sativa / Indica balance. It is so uplifting, it has become a personal essential. It can bring hope into the worst day of your life and will bring you a smile for the present moment. It is so relaxing and calming. The flavor is quite nice; overly earthy with an exotic wood scent that I can't quite pinpoint. Aromatic AF. This is a bea...”

“Great for anxiety and migraines. very unique flavor profile. Initial hit brought on a bit of mild euphoria followed by very nice buzz. Very creative feel and not too cloudy.  Be careful tho heavy use can clear your schedule... Def one of My go to" strains.”"
“Love me some FAK. I get very creative on this great tasting hybrid.”
“FanFuckingTastic... definitely that 'no fucks' given mentality. But you can still function and work on projects with no stress and tons of confidence.”
“My absolute favorite by the time I get back inside and sit on the couch I'm totally relaxed. It also helps with my RLS.”

“Definitely fire
Definitely alien
Definitely kush

Picked this strain up at Rose City Oreganics and the bag appeal is very nice; dark and light greens in the foliage with a frosted appearance from the trichomes. 
The smell earthy, slightly piney. The high is superb; clear, able to focus, complete tasks, but if you sit down, expect to be there. I use it to treat migraines and PTSD. One of my top five favs.”

“Tested at 21.52 THCA. 104% D9THC.    .00% CBD  .005% CBN
And 23.3% Cannabinoid content.

On first appearance it's light green with orange to dark red hairs and  was covered in alot of small trichs. the smell was very light . Much like the description it  leaned more to the alien kush and gives a heavy cerebral feeling at first and goes to a  relaxing  indica effect after a short while. would certainly try again.”
“AMAZING! Great night sleep!”
“AMAZING! Great night sleep!”

“One of the best highs I've ever had. I felt enlightened and ready to conquer anything. People might be turned
 off by the chemical flavor, but I literally loved it. One of my favorites”

“I think this is my new favorite evening bud. Leaves me clear-headed enough to enjoy complicated movies and games but makes my body comfortably numb and super relaxed. Nicely rounded indica hybrid with delicious herbaceousness.”
“Love the earthy pundginess and the warm feeling after draw. Heavy high.”
“This is legitimately my favorite strain! I smoke an ounce every week, plus dabs, and thc crystals. THIS IS MY FAVORITE!”
“Nice buzz!...chilled, lifted and relaxed”

“this strain I would have to say Ding,ding, we have a winner! 
smokes great taste amazing as it looks. 👌”
“My favorite strain for medicating a migraine or headache while also getting a very quality balanced high. Perfect hybrid.”
“Nice buzz!...chilled, lifted and relaxed”

“This phenotype of Fire Alien is a very mellow hybrid which delivers an enjoyable body high paired with a blissful and clarifying Sativa jolt.  It's buzz is desirable and is most definitely a frequently visited strain.”

“This is a very typical dominating kush sort of weed with alot of THC on it, i like the red/green combination - it makes the bud seem so beautifull in all details. 
Very recommended!”
“My favorite strain for medicating a migraine or headache while also getting a very quality balanced high. Perfect hybrid.”

“I've had versions of this grown in the Las Vegas Area. It seems like it takes more from the alien in the smell and high. It's decently frosty, good taste in vape but you get a little harshness on the exhale using the bong. I can see this could be an A grade bud with a little work.
The high left a little to be desired. I felt a decent headrush after massive loads but the effects weren't very long lasting or intense. I...”

“Fire Alien is such a great mood-lifter, and really helps counter any bad nerves or anxiety. I use this strain when I'm worried about something, as it cools the temper and eases the mind. It also gives the consumer great focus, perfect for some good reading.”

“This strain is a fucking trip, it has a really really strong euphoria a strong buzz feeling very strong indica feeling for sure but it did have sativa like features such as giggly and creative but this is for sure one of my favorite strains fro insomnia or stress would 100% recommend it to someone that wants a super strong strain”
“sweeeeeeet stuff”

“This is my absolute favorite strain of the moment!! I always smoke a bowl before watching a couple episodes of Brickleberry and then passing out. Fantastic for feeling like youre sinking into the bed. I couldnt stop laughing after smoking a bowl with friends, only a couple hits and youre high as a UFO! Also, love the sweet n fruity smell of this! Definitely appeals to people who dont want the stench of weed in their ...”
“Uplifting very tasty”
“Amazing High. Maybe one of the best highs I've ever had. Pops up in the grinder a bowl smokes for a while”
“farm sample #1”
“Gave me dry eyes, but still a nice smooth buzz”
“Unreasonably happy. And there's nothing wrong with that.”
“I thought this strain was different from what ive had and wouldn't mind having some more”

“This is a overall good strain. I get more indica type effects from this strain. Defiantly a great tasting and smoking weed. Unfortunately im more of a sativa person. Great for the kush fans out there. Its like a uplifting kush high its kinda weird. Its super green and crystally and doesnt taste like your typical kush...”
“great tasting med”
“Nice & Mellow!”
“super subtle happy high.”
“So, I was walking through the store last week, looking for some body wash. I happened upon a bottle of AXE and thought Wow
column4: douchebags still buy this"? I then looked at the ingredient list and saw a bunch of really nice smelling aromas
column5: confirmed after smelling the opened bottle. This strain reminds me of that. Its effects are ridiculous. Initial mellow mood with a ravenous sex drive that descends into relaxation. A...”"

column3: “A great cerebral high. Nice change of pace from the GSC. We'll see how it goes!”

“Picked up a quarter from a Medical Co Op in Tacoma. Smells very earthy. Kind of grassy. There's a pine scent with it too. Tastes about the same when smoked. It is definitely a 50/50 hybrid. It has the right body and head high ratio. I don't usually like hybrids and go either strait indica or strait Sativa, but this strain isn't bad. Good mix of both.”
“Extranjero fuego es muy bueno. Not too hard, not too soft...like Boys 2 Men abc/bbd. I heard this was coma inducing, but I didn't get that effect. Not disappointed though.”
“This strain was dry, crumbly, harsh, and not very effective for me personally, which is a shame because I love the name.”
